section.title: General
section.p: Logging is an important aspect of enterprise systems. Inq provides access to and extends Java Logging. For the rationale behind this and how to configure and use logging in Inq, please see the Logging Mini Guide.

section.title: Example Usage
section.p: The petstore blueprint application and Inq's bundled file transfer package contain examples of logging usage. Code can be found in app/examples/petstore and app/filexfer respectively.
